faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is this a replacement for my brokerage account?
faq.a1: Not at all. Clear Cut Markets is a news intelligence tool, not a broker. You manage your trades on your preferred platform — we provide the AI-powered insights to help you make informed decisions faster.
faq.q2: How does the AI news analysis work?
faq.a2: Our system continuously scans 15+ trusted sources including Reuters, Bloomberg, SEC filings, and social sentiment platforms. We use advanced AI to analyze each article, extract sentiment, identify which of your holdings are affected, and explain the potential impact in plain English.
faq.q3: What makes this different from Google Alerts or news aggregators?
faq.a3: Regular aggregators just filter by keywords. Clear Cut uses AI to understand context and find hidden connections. For example, a chip shortage in Taiwan might not mention Tesla — but our AI knows Tesla depends on those chips and will alert you to the connection.
faq.a4: You can track stocks (US exchanges), major cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, and more), and popular ETFs. We're constantly expanding coverage based on user requests.
faq.q5: How does the free trial work?
faq.a5: The Free tier is free forever with 1 module and limited AI analysis. If you want the full experience, Pro comes with a 14-day free trial — no credit card required. Cancel anytime.
faq.q6: How quickly will I get alerts?
faq.a6: Our system processes news within minutes of publication. For significant events affecting your portfolio, you'll typically receive an alert within 5 minutes via email and in-app notification.
